Trigger.Name: Cast over
Trigger.RegularExpression: (Something bites|You reel in your line|The fish gets away)

Trigger.Name: Show time since cast
Trigger.RegularExpression: (You cast your line on the|You cast your line at|You cast your line in)

Trigger.Name: Legendary node up
Trigger.RegularExpression: You sense level \d+ legendary (mature tree|mineral deposit) to the

Trigger.Name: Unspoiled node up
Trigger.RegularExpression: You sense level \d+ unspoiled (mature tree|mineral deposit) to the

Trigger.Name: Step 2
Trigger.Description: Always Single Mind + Impulsive Appraisal II

Trigger.Name: Step 1
Trigger.Description: Always Single Mind + Impulsive Appraisal II

Trigger.Name: Step 3
Trigger.Description:
If collectability >= 290: Single Mind + Impulsive Appraisal II
If collectability < 290: Impulsive Appraisal II

Trigger.Name: Step 4 (no Single Mind on 3)
Trigger.Description:
If collectability >= 385: Single Mind + Utmost Caution + Methodical Appraisal
If collectability >= 350 and < 385: Single Mind + Utmost Caution + Impulsive Appraisal II
If collectability < 350: Discerning Eye + Utmost Caution + Methodical Appraisal

Trigger.Name: Step 4 (with Single Mind on 3)
Trigger.Description:
If collectability >= 440 and <500: Single Mind + Stickler
If collectability < 440: Utmost Caution + Methodical Appraisal
